name: Cassandra's Journey: The Legacy of Nostradamus
name_original: Cassandra's Journey: The Legacy of Nostradamus
description:
Cassandra's Journey: The Legacy of Nostradamus is a puzzle game developed by JoyBits. It came out on 02-10-2008. Big Fish Games published the game. Most rawgers rated the game as "Exceptional".
You can play Cassandra's Journey: The Legacy of Nostradamus on PC.
